mapper.sql: id, uid, user_name, login_user_name, nick_name, icon, open_id, content, content_type, content_time, serial_number, state, remark, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from robot_report_case
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into robot_report_case (id, uid, user_name, login_user_name, nick_name, icon, open_id, content, content_type, content_time, serial_number, state, remark, create_time, update_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

update robot_report_case set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_user_name = #{loginUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content_type = #{contentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content_time = #{contentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT r.open_id as openId, r.serial_number as serialNumber FROM robot_report_case r INNER JOIN ( SELECT open_id, serial_number,max(content_time) as contenttime from robot_report_case WHERE state = 1 GROUP BY open_id,serial_number ) tb ON r.open_id = tb.open_id AND r.content_time = tb.contenttime WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,r.content_time,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) > 15

SELECT
FROM robot_report_case WHERE uid =#{uid} AND state = 2 AND content_type='image' GROUP BY serial_number ORDER BY content_time DESC;

SELECT
FROM robot_report_case WHERE user_name =#{phone} AND state = 2 AND content_type='image' GROUP BY serial_number ORDER BY content_time DESC;
